question: You have recently moved to a different city. Write a letter to your friend. In your letter:• Explain why you decided to move to a different city• Describe the new city and accommodation• Ask your friend to arrange a visit
text: I hope you are doing well. I'm writing this letter to give you some good news.

I'm excited to share that I  finally moved to Mumbai city a few days back. As you know that I applied for a job last month, and now, I've been selected for this opportunity. So I have to shift to this city for my work commitments.

What's more, working in Mumbai is my dream project which has become true. On top of that work exposure in this city is quite competitive, and I think it would be great for new experiences. Plus, a company has given me a shared apartment equipped with several modern amenities. It is located on the 5th floor, in the Goregaon area.
I was wondering if you will come to my new house and enjoy some time with us to celebrate these moments.
I am looking forward to seeing you soon at my home.
